issue.title: [Format] Clarify dictionary encoding edge cases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6473](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6473). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Several recent threads on the mailing list:

1.  Edge case for all null columns and interleaved dictionaries

2. Semantics non-delta dictionaries (and relation to the file format).

3.  Propose a forward compatible enum so dictionaries can represented as other types besides for a "flat" vector.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6473?focusedCommentId=16985741) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5585
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5585>
